name: Jawesome Date
description:
Jawesome Date was created in less than 48 hours by 7 students from the Enjmin game school.  Made for the ENJAM2017 with the theme "Do not attack", a game jam for and by the students of Enjmin game school.

------------About the Game---------------------------------------------------------

You play as an awesome shark at a restaurant. It's their first date and he wants to impress the cute guy in front of him. But it will be a challenge, because  he also really really wants to eat him ! Tough choice...

Try to pick good answers while you're craving for blood !

YOU CAN EAT PEOPLE AT THE RESTAURANT TO GAIN MORE ANSWERS

------------Controls------------------------------------------------------------------

Mouse Controls.

Click on objects and answers to choose what to speak about.
